    • Method Detail

      • samplePolygonUniformly

        public Pnt2d[] samplePolygonUniformly​(Pnt2d[] V,
                                      int M)
        Samples the closed polygon path specified by V at M equi-distant positions.
        Parameters:
        V - the vertices of the (closed) polygon.
        M - the number of sample points.
        Returns:
        the sample points as an array of Point objects.

      • samplePolygonUniformly

        public Pnt2d[] samplePolygonUniformly​(Pnt2d[] V,
                                      int M,
                                      double startFrac)
        This is for testing: allows to choose an arbitrary start point by setting 'startFrac' in [0,1].
        Parameters:
        V - the vertices of the (closed) polygon.
        M - the number of sample points.
        startFrac - the position of the first sample as a fraction of the polggon's circumference in [0,1].
        Returns:
        the sample points as an array of Point objects.
